sentences.en: As business is bad these days, we have to retrench.
sentences.cn: 由于最近生意不景气, 我们不得不紧缩开支.

sentences.en: Inflation has forced us to retrench.
sentences.cn: 因通货膨胀我们不得不紧缩开支.

sentences.en: Shortly afterwards, cuts in defence spending forced the aerospace industry to retrench.
sentences.cn: 不久之后，国防开支的削减迫使航空航天业紧缩开支。

sentences.en: The mess of Wall Street means the families have to retrench.
sentences.cn: 华尔街的动荡对很多家庭来说意味着新一轮的勒紧腰带过日子.

sentences.en: They must retrench their expenditure for the purpose of making up the deficit.
sentences.cn: 为了弥补赤字,他们必须压缩开支.

sentences.en: Why don't you retrench then - scrape up, hoard , economise?
sentences.cn: 那么你为什么不节约一下 —— 积累一点, 储蓄一点, 省吃俭用一些 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: if a government or organization retrenches, it spends less money
